alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 2:54PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 345 PM MST... At 253 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Apache Junction, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Apache Junction, Queen Creek, Chandler Heights, Seville, Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport, Gold Camp and Higley. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 187 and 196. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 164 and 167. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 29 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
